tr.td: Element `FormularyItem.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead.

div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/FormularyItem|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `FormularyItem.code` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element `FormularyItem.status` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.

title.value: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 FormularyItem to FHIR R4 Basic

description.value: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 FormularyItem to FHIR R4.

comment.value: Element `FormularyItem.meta` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.meta` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.implicitRules` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.implicitRules` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.language` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Resource.language` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.text` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.text` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.contained` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `DomainResource.contained` and is compatible, use that element instead.

Element `FormularyItem.identifier` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped. Element matches Basic element path `Basic.identifier` and is compatible, use that element instead.
Element `FormularyItem.code` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
Element `FormularyItem.status` is not mapped to FHIR R4, since FHIR R5 `FormularyItem` is not mapped.
